title: Water Main Break & Boil Water Advisory Update (City of Athens and Clarke County, GA) ...
text: ( Source : City of Athens and Clarke County, GA ) Repairs on the 24' broken water main on the Athens-Clarke County water distribution system are ongoing. The Public Utilities Department anticipates the repairs to be completed by midnight on
